fruits.name: Mango
fruits.description: Elevate your culinary adventures and embrace the tropical paradise with the king of fruits - the mango - a true symbol of indulgence and exotic luxury.

fruits.name: Orange
fruits.description: Packed with vitamin C and bursting with flavor, the orange is the perfect pick-me-up for any time of day, invigorating your taste buds and brightening your day with its radiant color and unparalleled freshness.

fruits.name: Apple
fruits.description: Immerse yourself in the crisp, juicy perfection of the classic apple, natures ultimate temptation waiting to be savored

fruits.name: Litchi
fruits.description: Experience the exotic allure of the luscious litchi, a tantalizing tropical delight straight from the orchards of Asia.
